name: NOSTALGIC TRAIN
description: The jury selection of the 22nd Japan Media Arts Festival.人が消えた田舎で記憶を失って一人目を覚ました私。「夏霧」と書かれた駅。単線の鉄道。夏霧の記憶を巡る少し切なく幻想的なウォーキングシミュレーター。
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows7 64bits or later Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q8400 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4 620 @ 2.6 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows7 64bits or later Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX560 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
